mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Is Our Command!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strolling into my favorite coffee shop, expecting the usual royal treatment. But alas, my barista had the audacity to ask for my name for the order! My entitlement alarm went off, and I promptly demanded a personal apology in the form of a free latte for life. Needless to say, I walked out feeling vindicated and thoroughly caffeinated. A true victory for all Hot Joshs out there!
